1472380.name: 怪盗探偵ブロンドレディ
1472380.description:
Slapstick platformer 2D action game featuring a beautiful thief and a detective!

Pass through the security guards and get the treasure!

There are guards and traps all along the way to the treasure!
Use your stomping and skill to defeat the enemies and quickly run through the stage to get to the treasure before they find you!

Run away from the persistent detective as fast as you can!

Even if you finally get the treasure, there are traps in front of you and detectives behind you!
The detective is also using his skills and doesn't seem to want to let you go for free...
You must keep your cool and run to the goal so that you don't "fall down in surprise and fail to break away!

Characters

.
.

Lupin (CV. Koizumi Monaka)

.Occupation: Phantom thief
A cat-loving girl who is good at magic tricks.
She is dexterous and can do anything, but she can also get carried away and make a big mistake...
She uses magic tricks to distract the guards!

.

Holmes (CV. Mawata Spica)

.Occupation: Detective
An eccentric who knows a lot about plants and medicines and carries around an aphrodisiac of his own making.
He loves cute girls...!
Tricky with a whip and hypnotic gas, he attacks the phantom thief!

.

Goemon (CV. Uten Hiyori)

.Occupation: Phantom thief
A quiet girl with few words.
People around her think she doesn't know what she's thinking, and she's a bit of a stiff...
She even shoots down bullets with her swordsmanship!

.

Heiji (CV. Kuranami Ao)

.Occupation: Detective
She is an older sister and lives with her younger sister.
She is optimistic and cheerful, and treats everyone with open arms.
She uses her ten hands and koban to hunt down thieves from various distances!

.

Shinobu (CV. Koizumi Monaka)

.Heiji's younger sister. She is an excellent cook.
She is a strong person who takes care of all the household chores as well as the family finances.

.

Watson (CV. Amane)

.Holmes' assistant. Loves Holmes.
She does all the miscellaneous work of the detective agency by herself.
